title: The Last flight of Noah's Ark
creator_credit: Charles Jarrott, Ron Miller and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: When a vintage B-29 bomber strays from its course over the Pacific, its crew - a high-living pilot, a prim missionary and two stowaway orphans - is forced to beach it on an unmapped tropical island. Stranded, they plot their way back to civilization. Stars Elliott Gould, Genevieve Bujold, Ricky Schroder, and Vincent Gardenia.
creator_credit_for_label: Charles Jarrott, Ron Miller and Walt Disney Productions
